mapper.insert: insert into Company (CompanyID, CompanyNameCn, CompanyNameEn, RegisteredAddressCn, RegisteredAddressEn, Zip, InputDate, CreateMbclAccountID, Status) values (#{companyID},#{companyNameCn},#{companyNameEn},#{registeredAddressCn},#{registeredAddressEn},#{zip}, #{inputDate},#{createMbclAccountID},#{status})
